content.detailedDescription:
ovni em avarã©-sp, brazil.

descriã§ã£o dos fatos ocorridos no dia do avistamento do ovni sobre a represa em avarã©-sp.      

no dia 19/10/2014, domingo, por volta das 17h:30min, eu voltava da represa jurumirim para avarã©-sp de carro com meus filhos durante um forte vendaval e um tempo muito feio, caracterã­stico da chegada de uma tempestade,...Pequei meu celular e comeã§amos a filmar toda aquela agitaã§ã£o do tempo,...Quando vã­nhamos pela rod. sp255, chegando ao aterro da ponte para atravessã¡-la do lado de itaã­-sp, meu filho de 9 anos disse,...: -olha, tem uma coisa dentro da ã¡gua,...!! o que mais tarde ele disse que parecia ser um balde ou lata de lixo preta,... na hora, ninguã©m mais viu nada ou deu importã¢ncia ao fato e continuamos pela estrada filmando as ondas o cã©u e tudo mais,... ao chegar em casa, passei o filme para o computador e percebi que havia um ponto luminoso no cã©u, acima da represa e em baixa altitude pois as nuvens estavam baixas e ele estava bem abaixo delas,...Meu celular, filma em 21 quadros por segundos e usando o programa bsplayer, consigo ver quadro a quadro,...Entã£o voltei o filme e observei o objeto no cã©u,...Pude perceber que era um ponto luminoso â¨ovalâ¨, com quatro pontos menores ao redor, dois acima e dois abaixo, simetricamente posicionados,... depois voltei o filme ao ponto onde meu filho disse ter visto uma coisa na ã¡gua e comecei a olhar quadro a quadro,... pude constatar que havia sim um objeto na ã¡gua, preto parcialmente submerso,...Avanã§ando o filme, vi que ele â¨mergulhouâ¨ e apareceu novamente,...Depois disso, o objeto aparece e desaparece na ã¡gua vã¡rias vezes sendo que em algumas delas, ele parece estar flutuando no ar, logo acima da ã¡gua e quando se pode ver tambã©m, os pontos acima e abaixo dele, como o do objeto do cã©u, porã©m com cores mais escuras e sem brilho,...O objeto parece ter a forma de uma esfera, as vezes menor, preta e densa e as vezes maior e mais clara, como se inflasse e se tornasse menos densa e com os pontos a sua volta,....Num certo instante, quando ele parece flutuar no ar acima da ã¡gua, de uma fraã§ã£o de segundo para outra, ele desaparece e nã£o aparece mais,.... toda essa filmagem do objeto na ã¡gua nã£o dura mais que 5seg. mas ele pode ser visto em aprox. 64 fotos feitas a partir dos pauses que o programa permite e em menos de 10 fotos, com relativa clareza,...Meu sogro, que tambã©m voltava da represa e estava no carro da frente, disse tambã©m ter visto uma coisa na ã¡gua no mesmo local, e que parecia um tambor preto, desses de 200l, mas com os cantos arredondados, mas tambã©m nã£o deu importã¢ncia pois com aquele vento poderia ser qualquer coisa sendo arrastada,...Mais tarde, depois de assistir ao vã­deo muitas e muitas vezes, reparei outra coisa estranha no cã©u, logo acima e a direita do objeto luminoso,...Sã£o outros quatro ou cinco pontos luminosos entre as nuvens, formando um quadrado ou um pentã¡gono, â¨parecendo ser um outro objetoâ¨, maior, mais alto e mais distante que o primeiro. esse suposto segundo objeto, ainda nã£o estã¡ confirmado podendo ser apenas impressã£o pelo formato e iluminaã§ã£o das nuvens, mas tambã©m impressiona pela posiã§ã£o dos pontos luminosos sugerindo ser algo estranho. o vã­deo e as fotos jã¡ foram enviã¡das a vã¡rios ã³rgã£os e pessoas especializadas no assunto e atã© agora nã£o chegaram a nenhuma conclusã£o,... me pediram que enviasse uma cã³pia do vã­deo para o instituto de criminalã­stica do paranã¡ o qual tambã©m irã¡ investigar o caso. estou aguardando respostas e publicarei assim que chegarem.
o vã­deo original e as fotos estã£o no link a seguir.
[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Ovni apareceu na ã¡gua e depois no cã©u.

content.detailedDescription: This was really strange, my friend and i have pictures we took on our cells.This wasn't the first time i have seen strang objects in the sky.When i was around five there was a large round silver object that didn't make a sound. my dog blackie started barking and it zipped away extremely fast.When we lived in union county nc, we used to sit in the yard at night and see lights hovering above the trees at night,red,yellow,green,white but didn't know what it was and my grandfather and his sons never went into that part of the woods to hunt.I honestly believe that we are not alone in this vast universe,when i was a kid we were taught that it was only 9 planets,wow look at all the galaxies that has been discovered.If someone believes that earth is the only planet with beings,,,then something is really wrong with them. [item moved/cms/nd]
content.summary: This thing didnt make a sound,the pic on my phonedisturbs me

content.detailedDescription: While filming with a drone quadcopter equipped with a 1080p hd video camera, 60fps, i was flying and filming in and around a velodrome bike race track at hellyer park in san jose ca.I had been flying and filming for about 5 minutes around 4 o'clock in the afternoon at a height of approximately 90 to 100 feet. the video runs just over 5 minutes and although i personally did not see this object at the time it soared past my drones camera view as i stopped a pan from right to left , the camera clearly captured the object as it traveled from west to east at a downward angel from a 90 to 100 foot height down to the ground where it disappeared into the grass field inside the vellodrome.Once i returned home to view the video i shot i immediately noticed the bright white object in the video. i was unaware of this objects existence until i viewed the video for the first time. i then tried to freeze the video at different intervals in an attempt to distinguish what this object was and it was then that i was able to track the trajectory of the object as it traveled to the ground. by starting and stopping the video at the point it comes into view (2:09) you can follow the object all the way to the ground as it travels in a slightly curved line until it nears the ground and then it turns left and loops around returning to a straight line into the grass field where it disappeared. the object appears to be traveling at a very high rate of speed although i cannot determine the actual speed of the object. at first glance and observation of the object in the video it appeared to travel in a straight line until i began to start and stop the video at just the right interval to be able to track the object to the ground. it was then that i noticed the object actually curves a bit on its approach to the ground and then loops around and back again in the original direction until it disappeared into the grass field. the object first appears in the video at apx 2:09-2:10 into the video and lasts for a brief second or two. it comes in from the west in the lower right hand side of the video and travels downward to the ground. i have included the raw video and three stills taken from my monitor , one slightly blown up for a better view and one blown up a bit larger to try and distinguish what the object is and one with a trajectory overlay. i was told it is a classic "rod" ufo by someone supposedly in the know who viewed the video. i would welcome a qualified review of the video and explanation of what my camera captured.I believe this is not some kind of everyday creature and i am not qualified to make any intelligent observation of what my camera captured but i do believe i captured an extraordinary object unfamiliar to anything i have seen before other than knowledge of what another observer of the video stated that it is a classic "rod" ufo which i have seen on tv before in a documentary.
content.summary: Classic

content.detailedDescription:
march 09, 2015 
approximately 11:30 p.M. - 11:45 p.M.

john and i were sitting on the back porch having a cigarette. all outside lights were off and both dogs were inside. i was sitting in the chair to the right of the back door [east] looking up past the grapefruit tree in our yard at the stars [north]. john was crouched down sitting with his back to the door facing the grapefruit tree as well but his attention was east towards the sky. he said something about three balloons flying through the air and i thought he was looking in the direction i was, he wasn't, i didn't see them. john stood up and stepped down off the porch following what he saw; it was at this point that i noticed what he was talking about. as soon as i stepped off the porch [facing north] i noticed a single globe type object moving directly over my head to the west. it was round, but not perfectly. it was a semi-opaque light which looked as if it had been illuminated from the inside; white outer with a yellow and orange inside color. the light cast a dim ring of illumination that surrounded the semi-opaque object. john told me to look around in the sky while he kept an eye on it. i quickly scanned in all directions and looked back to the object. it moved quickly but not fast, steadily, straight west. it traveled directly between 9th and 10th street, through our backyard. it was fairly close to us, it seemed closer than the helicopters that typically fly in our neighborhood at night. we continued watching it until it seemingly vanished while slowly ascending. there were no trees blocking our view in this direction.

we were stunned. we spent a good bit of time trying to figure out what it was. i was frightened, i refused to let go of john as we were walking around our yard staring into the sky. john went inside briefly to check on muffins we had put into the oven right before we went out for a cigarette. after he returned, we continued to stare into the sky discussing what we thought it was for about 5 minutes. 

i walked to the west in our back yard, in the direction we saw it disappear. i was looking in the sky, it was clear, no clouds. i could see betelgeuse to the south west as well as sirius and jupiter. out of nowhere from the south i saw a string of three lights floating across the sky right in front of me heading north. they were higher than the first object we saw. i yelled out to john and he came rushing over my way and we were yelling about the three lights and how fast they were moving and what we were really seeing. the lights changed formation, into what i can only describe as a right triangle if you were to draw lines between the lights. the three lights continued to move very steadily in this formation, quicker than the first object, over the trees in the backyard to the north/north east. these lights were perfectly circular; they were illuminated just as the stars in the sky were. they were not as big as jupiter appeared but not as small as sirius either. as we were watching the lights move, john yelled to me to go inside and get his phone, i was in and out in 2 seconds, enough time to continue watching the lights move over the trees in my neighborhood to the north/northeast until i couldn't see them anymore. i could hear john messing around and talking to his phone, i wasn't paying a lot of attention to him after i handed him the phone. at this point i was almost to the front gate line of my side yard as i was trying to get a better glimpse of the lights moving through the neighborhood trees after it moved over our backyard. we watched it until it was barely out of sight when i ran in and grabbed the binoculars to try and catch a better view before they moved out of sight. i lost them over the trees and lost a couple binocular lens caps in my yard in the process.

john went back in quickly to check on the muffins and came back outside. i asked for his phone and called my mom. she didn't pick up but i left her a voice mail which is time stamped at 11:45 p.M. we stayed outside for about 10 more minutes, saw a couple of airplanes flying through, and shared a cigarette just talking and trying to process what we saw.
content.summary: 3 spheres appeared e to w; formed one object glowed white yellow orange; vanished. 3 spheres reappeared in line sw to ne; formed right trangle; bright white.

content.detailedDescription:
at 8:09pm pst,on 03/09/2015, i was in my backyard when i noticed this very bright blob of light in the sky and it was not there the night before. i watched it for about 2 minutes to see if it was moving and it was not. 
 my husband brought the binoculars and through the binoculars i saw an oval shaped object at first with holes on the surface and then it began to change shape. there was a half moon shape, then an oval shape, a circle shape and then back to oval shape.  the light looked like it was coming from tubular structures and circular lights holding the next tubular light structure and so on. 
 i took a picture but it just looked like a white dot. then i got my compass out and it read 258 degrees west and at 8:11pm it moved to 261 degrees west. at 8:39pm it was getting smaller. when i got back from the store it was 9:11pm and it was gone. 
 i've seen shiny stationary silver objects in the sky and then they disappear before but this was much different and i was able to see it through binoculars changing shape. i don't know why, but i don't feel fear just curiosity and anxious to find out what they want.
content.summary: I saw a very bright light that was not moving. with binoculars i saw the light changing shape

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: The lights were very low about the size of a golf ball. some were alone some in the form of a triangle. no sound admitted. came along in a steam that lasted about 8 mins. came in small groups. some red lights alone. some in pairs others in triangle formation. i remember feeling scared and also interested. i tried to awake my neighbors no one answered. i then got scared i thought i was going to be abducted. i went inside my home and turned on the news hoping for an explanation. at first i thought the lights were flares but they stayed in a forward motion and never waivered from a straight path. i lost sight of all the red orbs when they were about 100 feet from my range of sight. i was home when this happened at 215 n hickory ave. the fact that i was unable to arouse my neighbors to witness it with me is what bothers me the most. i had went outside to smoke. it was very scary and interesting at the same time. i thought i was crazy when no one would get up or answer their door to help me. now i feel im targeted because of what i saw.
content.summary: Red dot like lights in no order

content.detailedDescription: I had just stepped outside tonight to observe the stars before getting ready for bed when i saw what appeared to be a satellite traveling south to north at a very high rate of speed. it was about 2.5 magnitude with a steady white light. i watch iss every time it comes our way and this thing is at least 4-5 times faster. this is the third time i have witnessed this, my wife and i saw it first last summer and i've witnessed it twice my self. i've talked to people with knowledge of satellite technology and have been told there is no satellite that goes faster than iss (that they know of) but there is no doubt that this was in a satellite orbit. there are no strobes and no sound, it simply zips through the sky. iss usually takes 5-6 minutes to go from horizon to horizon but this is about a minute and a half. i'm hoping someone else will come forward as i can't be the only one seeing this.
content.summary: Object in satellite orbit moving 4-5 times faster than iss

content.detailedDescription: I was outside cutting a fire break  on my property and found prints that should not be . my wife and i live 15 miles out of town at the end of a small dirt road . we have seen lights in the past that i would call a ufo.  one that hovered up are valley and put out a beam of light on are place. the prints are covered now so not to disturb. i have never reported a ufo before but in my life i know i have had 4. i hope that you can tell me what i found.   thank you [name and phone number removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: I found 2 mechanical looking imprints in hard muddy soil in a place they should not be. there also appears to be two small holes dug into the soil near one of the holes.  we live out in the middle of nowhere ,

content.detailedDescription: As a child we were playing hide and seek in the saguallo hills of penuelas owned by our family..I ran to a hillside to hide and while hiding i heard a buzzing sound like there were bees hovering over me. i rolled to my back and there was a craft hovering over me with rotating lights directly above me. i was temporarily paralyzed snd i was in complete shock. i wanted to hide but could not move. the craft hovered for about 30 seconds then flew straight up into space in a flash. to this day i never shared my story because back in 1945 nothing like this never existed. i'm 77 years old and i wanted to share my story because i didn't want to take this to my grave and needed to share it. i asked my nephew to contact someone about this to see if they want me to share more info. i speak spanish and broken english. email in this form is my son "f" and nephew "a". call if you have any questions. thank you for your time.
content.summary: object hovered above me with a strong buzzing sound. i was temporarily paralyzed.

content.detailedDescription: Looked out of window for deer. saw single round white light object travelling rapidly wsw to ene. no sound, no flashing lights, 2 to 3 second sighting. it went nearly over the house but i did not hear any noise. hills to east so aircraft sight and sound may not be heard by the time i went outside to listen for plane, windy couldn't hear any. i'm familiar with satellites and meteorites. too big and travelling too low for satellite. not enough glow and no trail for meteorite. kind of exciting cause this is nothing i've ever seen.
content.summary: Rapidly moving white sphere. no noticed glow. no sound heard. no flashing lights. not a satellite, unless it was crashing. lost sight due to hills.

content.detailedDescription: I was heading home from work, driving down state road 38 east in lafayette, in just before the interstate 65 junction. it was around 8am. the object was very bright in the sky impossible for anyone to miss if they we're driving in that direction. when i first saw it my heart jumped because it didn't look like anything i had ever seen. my first thought without hesitation was that it was a ufo. my second thought was it had to be a plane or something being launched but it didn't look at all like a plane and i doubt there would be anything launched from our city. it didn't appear to be moving but it was very far away. if it was moving it looked like it was shooting up into space. i wasn't sure how to react other than to take a picture. i only showed it to two people and they had not comment. i lost sight of it by turning on to 65 n but it didn't disapear.
content.summary: Metallic and very bright and reflective

content.detailedDescription: My kids and i were hiking on picacho peak in las cruces new mexico yesterday afternoon. we continually heard what sounded like fighter jets very high in the sky way above us and none of us were able to spot anything. we never saw these objects until this picture, but we heard sounds above us continually yesterday.
content.summary: I have an incredible photo!

content.detailedDescription: I recently turned in a sighting about a month ago and got an email back but somehow deleted the email. i did some research of my last sighting and i am pretty sure the beam of light i saw coming from space to ground went to yakima firing center (yfc-i used to train there when i was in the wash army nat guard). as i said in my last sighting i constantly see lights above my house but this last sighting was like nothing i've seen before. i saw some light flashes to the east again at 3:30am moving west for about a 2min then it stopped. when i came out at 5:30am to smoke i saw a light (very small light because i believe they are extremely high up=above commercial aircraft levels). this flashing light moved to almost directly ahead when i saw a beam of white light (again very high so it looked small). about a min after a the short flash of the beam light i saw a much larger and jagged edged red flash of light much larger than all the other flashes. i think it was an explosion very high up, maybe even in space. there was a bunch of light pollution from the full moon. i don't even think you would see it unless you were looking at it. i then got my binoculars out and looked up and i was able to see to small lights moving in formation until they did a turn so fast i actually lost them. in the last sighting report i said if you just aimed an infrared camera up in the sky at my house at night you would see all kinds of strange lights and objects. well i haven't seen anything since then, (don't know what that means) until now. i honestly believe and i know this sounds crazy when i say it but it looked like some kind of space fight or battle happened. like i said at the beginning this is the weirdest thing i've seen yet.
content.summary: Possible space fight

content.detailedDescription:
I wasn't born during that time. however, i was born near the area. i heard many stories happened in "wah fu estate", from ufo to ghost story. i automatically link it up with place like the "skin walker range" in salt lake city. 

this isn't the only case happen in "wah fu estate", in fact, early in the 1970s, there are already story about seeing ufo. between the 1980s-1990s, a ufo which very similar with the one i reported appear again, which not sure have a written record or not, but many eyewitness. (most of the case happened in "wah fu estate" have more then 10 eyewitness.)

i didn't see it directly, however, according to the info i get, i think it is very hard to mix with any other known flying objects, as it was very big and having a dish shape.

according to the eyewitness, it happens that the bottom of the ufo had light which bright enough to wake up a person who was napping. some said no sound but some who live in a higher level of the building claim a humming sounds made him pay attention out the window before he saw the light. it fly above the building slowly, and finally fly toward the direction toward "lamma island", which is about west/south west of "wah fu estate"  

addition info: during the period of time, hong kong was a british colony. when the british government reveal the ufo document around the year 2012, it record that the british navy had seen an ufo at the sea near the "wah fu estate". however, no extra detail came out with the file.  

ps:the total number of witnesses i put 10, but in fact, it should be more. however, the witnesses are getting old so i hope investigation will be hold as soon as possible.
content.summary: There are many cases happened in wa fu estate in hk
content.locationName: Wah Fu Estate, Hong Kong Island

content.detailedDescription: While sitting outside with friends , we noticed this thing that looked to be a fireball come from the southeast moving up in the sky then following a path west. we thought it was something on fire in the sky at first, except it was moving as fast as a plane. we watched until it dissappeared. then about ten minutes later another one, looking just like the other showed up following the same path and dissappeared. we waited , and a third one appeared about thirty minutes later. a friend took video of the second one and we tried to take video of the third one and for some reason the video would not take. my feelings were very mixed and confused. it can not be a meteor because it was not falling but going up and following a very direct path. no trail left behind. also it appeared to move around very fast at one time.
content.summary: Looked to be three fireball like shapes at different times going east to west

content.detailedDescription: Coming out from work around 2am it was a very cold night i noticed a what looked like vegetation imprints on my car dashboard it was strange my car parked in a clear spot empty from any nearby trees
content.summary: On my car dashboard from outside footprints of vegetation not found nearby it was extremely cold night

content.detailedDescription: No comment
content.summary: All i can say is mind blown like wow  unbelieveable got it all on tape

content.detailedDescription: We was standing in our driveway saying goodbye to my cousins when my cousin said "what is that in the sky?" we all looked and saw a balloon like object just hovering.  it was at that point when my husband decided to go get his camera.  upon his return the object had moved to the east and these are the pictures he captured. we still are unsure of what we might have seen, as balloons do not hover. it moved at a rapid speed across the sky and then seemed to hover again in the east. then the object disappeared.
content.summary: We noticed an object hovering in the sky and decided to take pictures

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving home we had just rounded a corner going up a slight hill (we live on mary hill)and immediately we both saw the bright lights and my husband slowed to a stop in the truck.  the lights were in the centre of our vision, directly down the road we were driving, could not miss them. (we both had witnessed a light phenomenon in mexico in the mayan riveria about 7 years ago....So we knew what we saw immediately wasn't right....)i was trying to look and fumble at my phone to try to get a video asap.  the lights were just over the top of the trees/houses there were 5 lights, four of them were hovering, moving extremely slowly in unison, three out front were in an arc pattern and then one centred at the back about 20 or 30 yards behind and between the orange/red lights (very very intense balls of light)was a much smaller rapidly and irratic moving white light between the lights.  it was moving extremely fast and i could not decifer a pattern in its movement, just rapid movement within the parameter of the other lights.  the entire group of lights were moving extremely slowly to the right...West direction it looked like they were right over eastern drive, the street we live on.  we were driving up western and were about 7 or 8 blocks away from eastern drive when we first spotted the lights and slowed and stopped the truck.  i tried my best to video on my phone but was shaking so badly my husband never took his eyes off the lights, and we started to drive quickly towards them about another block and just past lamprey they clean just disappeared.  just completely dissapered like the lights turned off, no rapid movement or anything and no sound..  we do get a lot of helicoptors as well as float planes in our area so we are very used to the noise and sound of aircraft.  i had my window down and there was only the sound of our vehicle.  we drove very fast up the last of the way to eastern and tried to see if we could see anything at all as eastern was more at the crest of the hill, and there was nothing....Crystal clear night, stars way up in the distance....I could clearly see orions belt, as well as a airplane way off in the distance...Absolutely no other lights.  we drove the two blocks to our house at the corner of eastern and elinor.  we ran inside and out to our deck that has a full view of the entire valley, and absolutely nothing.  i thought i saw one red orange light to the north west but it was over near sfu hill and disappeared quickly, and i wasnt' sure if my eyes were playing tricks.  we called our neighbor who also ran out and looked in the sky with us for about 5 minutes....Nothing at all. we were both very rattled by this and i had the shakes for the rest of the night...
content.summary: Four very bright red/orange balls of light, three out front in an arch pattern and one centred exactly behind with one very bright white and fast moving in irradic pattern in middle of lights, hovering or moving very very slowly very low noiseless

content.detailedDescription: Just before i left to go to work (19.00) there a star like light speeding across the sky but it was not flashing and no other lights present with it, was travelling faster than a plane twice as fast i would say. then when i was driving back from work (22.04) there was a bright white light beaming down, it was about 100 yards away from me, hovering about 20 ft in the sky, it was so bright it lit up the outline/underneath of the object it was coming from. it was like a 3d triangular metalic ship almost floating above me, i stopped in my car to look at it in the pitch black clear sky and it suddenly turned bright green flame trail (northan lights green) and zoomed off in opposite direction of the moon in a straight line, then totally disappeared in thin air leaving a steam trail behind it. when i got home 4 miles down the road i looked up into the sky and there was a steam trail/track just above the house coming from the direction i had left. then looking up towards the moon there was a steam trail in the shape of a cross(x) glaring in the moonlight, with tornado look alike clouds spiraling down. when my partner tried to take a photo there was an orb floating in front of his camera. i couldnt get a photo of the craft/ship so i will upload a photo of a similar looking one off the internet.
content.summary: Bright white light beaming onto ground, lit up outline of craft then turned bright green and zoomed off and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed a balloon like cluster floating in the sky, so figured some one released black balloons tied together filled with helium. but noticed a flash blinking below. so i stopped my car and was amazed at what i was looking at, cross shaped, moving ufo. at times it would take a pyramid shape. and as it was at its lowest point, it would fly lop sideded. then slowly rose up and became less viable and vanished. this accurred near freeway, and was also witnessed by a friend.
content.summary: Weird floating in sky

content.detailedDescription: Friday march 6, 2015 at approx. 8:45 pm, my wife and mother in law were driving north on piedra rd in sanger, ca and noticed an incredibly bright light behind them.  first thinking it was a car, or truck, even possibly an atv with their high beams on, realizing that the truck that was behind them turned off a side road, they then realized that this was something different.  my wife noticed it was roughly 3 feet or so above the road, and traveling pretty fast.  this object was circular in shape, but not a perfect circle..She said it wasnt like an egg either..She cant really describe the shape as it was a shape that she couldnt relate to..And this object was only about as big as a beach ball. in the middle of this object was as she described a incredibly brilliant white light,which did not light up any trees or the road below it, which was unusual, she said this was brighter than any high beam or led she has ever seen. she could notice some blinking lights on the bottom..Not sure of color or amount.  my mother in law said there might have been bluish lights on the bottom and said there were about 4 of them.  they said the object was only about 3 or 4 seconds behind them, my wife put it as if her mother would have hit her brakes that this thing would have hit them, it was that close!! from the point of first contact, they were only about 4 miles from home, it followed them the entire time until they came to a bridge which is where piedra comes to an end.  at this point they both noticed the object was nowhere to be seen.  they made the rest of the trip home which was only a couple of minuets.  both of them scared and excited about what they have just seen and trying to figure out what exactly it was.  once home, they got out of the car and noticed the object returned next to a vacant store right by the residence.  the object was clearly off the ground, and the store does not have any sort of lights on the outside, atleast any that work, but especially at the area this object was hovering. my wife then ran to the house to get her cellphone so she could take a picture.  she was only in the house for about 30 seconds or so and the object was still there so she snapped a couple pictures.  immediately called me, and at this point the object was gone, and no sign of its presence anywhere. this is not the first time this has happened, and couple of weeks prior a resident living in the same area witnessed the same type of object just not as upclose and personal.  over the last few years of living out in the foothills of sanger my wife and i have witnessed some interesting things, she would on multiple occasions see lights across the street from where she worked and it was not any sort of vehicle that she knows of, we have both witnessed what looked like a plane or helicopter flying over pretty low, but when we stopped and looked up this object made no noise and only had one maybe two lights on it and it was moving very slow, she also witnessed red lights that seem to dart off in a direction that no other aircraft could do...Thank you for reading our report of this strange encounter and the past encounters..My wife has no access to a computer so i put this report in on her behalf..I know my wife and she was very shaken up about this..The dark photo with the different lights is the one with the anomaly the light more towards the top does not belong there..The ones lower on the image are a neighbors little solar lights...The other pics are just showing the area the pic was looking at..Because the one with the object is too dark to see surrounding trees and the store this object was near..And my wife said that when she was taking the photo of the object that with the naked eye she could see some lights blinking on the bottom but with her phone camera she couldnt get a clear enough picture..Take what u want from this experience..It happened..I believe her...Thank u again
content.summary: Followed my wife and mother in law while driving only about 3 or so feet above road

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 9:35 pm when i went outside to smoke. there was snow everywhere and campus was closed that day because of it. it was fairly cold outside as well. the roads were really bad and there were basically no cars driving around at the time. it still wasn't completely dark outside as well. i had the door to my garage open (not the actual garage door, but a small door that you can use to get in the garage) and i was standing in the doorway halfway between outside and in the garage while i was smoking. 

right when i finished smoking, something caught my eye above the trees to my house. what i saw...I'll never forget for the rest of my life. i'll describe it as best as i can. it was undoubtedly an aircraft..I knew that instantly. however, it did not look like any known aircraft that exists. the first thing i saw was something coming out from above the trees, and the way it moved...It was impossible. it was right in front of me, yet it made no sound. for how big this thing was, and how close it was to me. it was as big as a fighter jet above my house. i could see it plainly. it was black, triangle shaped but not exactly a triangle. not only that, but it had white orbs built into the bottom of the aircraft. there were quite a few of these white orbs. it slowly moved in a straight line when i saw it, it moved so slow...With no propulsion..Like it was hovering. there were no lights on it either. it shifted to the right a little to reveal more white orbs attached to the bottom of it. again, these orbs were not lit up. it had to have something to do with it being able to move like it did. 

the whole thing lasted about 10 seconds before i turn around and ran back into my garage, tripped over a push mower, and ran back through a door in my garage that connects to my room, and locked the door behind me. i have never been so scared in my entire life. nothing in my entire life have a seen anything that comes close to what i saw that night. it changed my life. my entire life culminated into a single moment wouldn't be as significant as what i saw. i was crying out of fear and confusion. i didn't go back outside for the rest of the night.

before this event, i always considered ufo's to be a possibility, but i never considered them to be a reality. until now. there is no doubt in my mind that what i saw was real. i don't know if this was a government entity or otherwise. all i know is that it was a highly advanced aircraft, with technology that we couldn't even comprehend. it fairly easy to make that assumption from what i saw.

i have no reason to lie about this. i can't sleep at night now, and i am afraid for my life. i am almost positive that it saw me, because of my proximity to it. this happened only days ago, and i am still scared to go outside now at night. i've never been like this before. it is like seeing a ghost; something unreal that you can't explain. 

i have so many questions about what i saw, but no answers. that's the scariest part. i hope that my story gets out there, because i want people to know that these things, whatever they are, are out there. i have included a drawing that i did about 1 minute after this happened. it is not completely accurate because was symmetrical designs on both sides of it, but it is the best i can do. i never really got a good look at the back of it either. thank you so much for reading about what happened to me.
content.summary: Black triangle right above the trees of my house. changed my life forever.

content.detailedDescription: It was 6:30am and i was walking my dogs. i looked up and saw a slow wobbling glowing orb going from south to north. there were no blinking lights and did not travel like an airplane, it simple wobbled from left to right heading north at an extremely high altitude. i lost sight of it after about 5 mins.
content.summary: Super high altitude orb like light traveling slow, wobbling heading north until too far too see.

content.detailedDescription:
I began watching a television show with my fiance at 11:00 pm last night (march 8, 2015). sometime around 11:15-11:30pm i saw something in the air in the corner of my eye so i looked out my window from where i was sitting on my couch. 

i immediately recognized that the aircraft was unique. it was a perfect triangle shape with all three edges straight. i immediately got up, stood on the other couch and looked out the window. the aircraft was traveling relatively slowly and at a low altitude. i was able to see the aircraft itself, not just the lights. i called for my fiance, who was sitting on the other couch and did not see it when it passed by the window. she jumped up onto the couch with me and watched it as it flew off. by the time she saw it, it was father away and hard for her to see anything except for the triangle lights. 

i have been thinking back to what i saw all day and trying to remember more details about it, but i can't remember certain details with absolute certainty so i left them out. i believe that the lights on the aircraft were two of the same color and one a different color, but i cannot remember with certainty what colors they were, so i am not including that information. i cannot remember if they were pulsating or blinking. 

i cannot remember with certainty the color of the craft but it appeared almost greyish. i remember seeing the texture on the bottom of the craft but cannot remember much about it. from the time i saw it to the time it was flying off in the distance was a matter of seconds. the time that i was able to see it low and detailed was perhaps 3 seconds. i was somewhat in awe and wish i had my camera and big zoom lens on hand when this happened. the aircraft seemed to be flying low and appeared to be large, but not huge. if i had to guess, it was somewhat smaller than a commercial airplane, but bigger than a small cesna airplane. based on what i perceived its elevation to be, i would estimate the aircraft was between 20-50 feet long, maybe larger as it was difficult to tell just how low it was.

following the sighting, perhaps ten seconds later i heard two or three banging sounds coming from outside my window in the direction the aircraft was flying. i cannot say if they were related to this at all as i live in a populated town on main avenue so there are always sounds of cars and people outside anyway.
content.summary: Saw very clearly and nearby a triangle shaped aircraft with a light on each corner

content.detailedDescription: I saw the object from a train i was taking from chicago to los angeles. the object stayed with the train for 81 miles and seemed to be travelling parallel to us. it didn't change height or direction. i eventually lost sight of it behind clouds.
content.summary: Observed from train for 81 miles

content.detailedDescription:
Observed afternoon 4:45 day before clock se forward a star like object
wnw at about 11:00 for 2 to 3 minutes. while watching thru spy glasses
object got a little brighter and within mil seconds faded out.
sun was bright and angle of sun was reflecting off object.
content.summary: Star object

content.detailedDescription:
In approximately february of 1973 on florida state road 46 at the st johns river bridge south of lake harney (28.714069n  81.034173w)my father and a co-worker were attacked by bright light; both men died within a year.

as told to me by my mother.  after working a double shift my father and a co-worker were returning home in my father's car around midnight.  when they got to the top of the st johns river bridge south of lake harney (fl sr 46) a bright light came from the sky and sat on the hood  the car. the light remained  all the way to the east side of the bridge disappearing only after he stopped.  my father died, his entire body riddled with cancer, the following november.  his co-worker died, cause unknown to me, within a year of the incident.
content.summary: Attacked by bright light, 2 men die within a year.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw yesterday (2015-03-08) around 9pm three bright orange objects moving very fast from southwest through "big dipper" constellation.
objects was approximately jupiter size, maybe a bit bigger and was moving in around each other and making strange maneuvers. third of that objects separated after half of their visible trajectory and disappeared. all incident last approximately about 5 or 6 seconds till all objects disappeared behind the horizon.
very impressive sighting. 

i would like to also inform that i saw very similar incident in slovakia in 1985 (not sure about year), but that time objects was not spherical shape, but triangular. all objects was rotating around each other in very fast velocity. incident last approximately about 5 or 6 seconds as well.

p.S.: apologize for mistakes in text, i am not native speaker ...
content.summary: Three orange spherical shaped objects very fast moving from sw, one separated and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: This was only noticed recently when i got a new large screen phone and was looking at some holiday snaps it was thru the train window i took many photos that day thru same window this was the only one the streak appeared on the sun was high and behind us as you can see by the shadows cast
content.summary: I was on snowdon mountain railway took several photos one had a bright streak cleary visable    ry visable
